isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove front cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If front cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If front cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing front cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

Remove front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY . For removing front cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Front Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 84 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
With the front cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 72)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove outer cab door handle (Item 1) from window run channel (Item 2) by pressing the locking tab (Item 3) in and slide the hanger support bracket (Item 4) out of the window run channel, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 84. Outer Cab Door Handle, Rear Window Run Channel and Hanger Support Bracket

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 85 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide the control rod (Item 1) coming from the outer cab door handle (Item 2) out of the lock lever (Item 3) of the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown.

Rotate outer cab door handle (Item 2) and slide it off the control rod (Item 5) coming from the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 85. Outer Cab Door Handle and Control Rods

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 86 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If it is necessary to replace the outer cab door handle (Item 1), rotate hanger support bracket (Item 2) counter clockwise, lining up the slot (Item 3) in the hanger support bracket with the T-shaped locking tab (Item 4) on the outer cab door handle and lift it off, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 86. Outer Cab Door Handle and Hanger Support Bracket

step1.para: Remove front cab door lock cylinder, refer to CAB DOOR LOCK CYLINDER . For removing front cab door lock cylinder, refer to Remove Cab Door Lock Cylinder on Front Cab Door of Standard Cab or Extended Cab Models and Front and Rear Cab Doors of Crew Cab Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 87 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove door lock control rod (Item 1) from door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Remove door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) from outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 87. Outer Cab Door Handle and Door Lock Control Rod

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove passenger side outer cab door handle on front cab door of standard cab, extended cab and crew cab for all models.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Cab Door Outer Cab Door Handle on Crew Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove rear cab door trim panel, refer to CAB DOOR TRIM PANEL . If rear cab door is equipped with electric door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Electric Door Window and Locks. If rear cab door is equipped with manual door window and locks, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Trim Panel with Manual Door Window and Locks.

Remove rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to CAB DOOR INNER DOOR PANEL WATER SHIELD
. For removing rear cab door inner door panel water shield, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Inner Door Panel Water Shield on Crew Cab for all Models.

Remove rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to MODULAR DOOR HARDWARE ASSEMBLY . For removing rear cab door modular door hardware assembly, refer to Remove Rear Cab Door Modular Door Hardware Assembly on Crew Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 84
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para:
With the rear cab door modular door hardware assembly (Item 1, Figure 74)
removed and placed on a suitable work surface. Remove outer cab door handle (Item 1) from window run channel (Item 2) by pressing the locking tab (Item 3) in and slide the hanger support bracket (Item 4) out of the window run channel, driver side shown.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 85
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide the control rod (Item 1) coming from the outer cab door handle (Item 2) out of the lock lever (Item 3) of the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown.

Rotate outer cab door handle (Item 2) and slide it off the control rod (Item 5) coming from the cab door latch (Item 4), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 86
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If it is necessary to replace the outer cab door handle (Item 1), rotate hanger support bracket (Item 2) counter clockwise, lining up the slot (Item 3) in the hanger support bracket with the T-shaped locking tab (Item 4) on the outer cab door handle and lift it off, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.

Remove rear cab door lock cylinder, refer to CAB DOOR LOCK CYLINDER . For removing rear cab door lock cylinder, refer to Remove Cab Door Lock Cylinder on Front Cab Door of Standard Cab or Extended Cab Models and Front and Rear Cab Doors of Crew Cab Models.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 87
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove door lock control rod (Item 1) from door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) on outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Remove door lock cylinder lever (Item 2) from outer cab door handle (Item 3), driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side outer cab door handle on rear cab door of crew cab models.
